name: ・Solitaire・ Card Game
description:
Play the #1 SOLITAIRE (or Klondike Solitaire / Patience) card game on iOS!
Klondike Solitaire, also known as Patience Solitaire, is the most popular solitaire card game in the world. Try our BEST SOLITAIRE card app, which is beautiful and fun like classic Windows Solitaire.

This Solitaire includes a fantastic Lep's World card deck.

Here you have the most original of all the classic Solitaire card games. (also known as Patience or Klondike). This is probably the most popular version of Solitaire! It is a truly solitary experience!

This Solitaire game also includes Daily Challenges! You will receive each day a unique Daily Challenge. Receive a crown for a day where you solve the Daily Challenge. If you win all crowns in a month you will win a trophy!

Are you bored of Solitaire apps that always seem to have the same rough gameplay and tired graphics? So try this completely custom version of Solitaire App, for iPad, iPod and for all kind of iPhones. This Solitaire has the best gameplay of any Solitaire in the market. Please try this Solitaire and we think you'll see and feel the difference. What have you got to lose? Solitaire is a free download!

== Klondike Solitaire Features ==

• Klondike Solitaire Draw 1 card
• Klondike Solitaire Draw 3 cards
• Portrait
• Landscape
• Vegas scoring
• Statistics
• Custom card backs and backgrounds
• Right and left handed mode
• Standard and Vegas scoring
• Daily Challenges
• Additional game mode: Yukon

Have fun with the best classic Klondike Solitaire in the Store!
